About

My name is Josh Martin and I am a Designer from Pittsburgh, living in Chicago.

I work primarily in branding, UI/UX, front‑end development, and marketing.

Currently

Most of my time is spent as a full-time freelance designer. A few hours here and there are spent illustrating and teaching myself animation.

Previously, Creative Director at ThreadMeUp (2015-2016), Lead UI/UX Engineer at Chicago Sun‑Times (2013-2015); Front‑End Developer at Power2Switch (2013); BFA Graduate of Edinboro University of Pennsylvania (2012)
